newsitem.title: USA: Tab Products board adopts holder rights.
newsitem.headline: Tab Products board adopts holder rights.

text.p: Tab Products Co said its board adopted a preferred stock purchase rights plan to guard against any potential use of takeover tactics.

Under the plan, stockholders will receive one Right to purchase one one-hundredth of a share of a new series of Preferred Stock for each outstanding share of TAB Common Stock held of record at the close of business on November 6, 1996.
